SELECT fp.*, dp.*, c.name as category_name FROM financial_product fp JOIN deposit_product dp ON fp.product_id = dp.product_id JOIN product_category c ON fp.category_id = c.category_id WHERE fp.fin_prdt_cd = #{productId}
SELECT DISTINCT kor_co_nm FROM financial_product WHERE category_id = #{categoryId} ORDER BY kor_co_nm
SELECT subcategory_id, name, description FROM product_subcategory WHERE category_id = #{categoryId} ORDER BY name
